info.name: TrustLedger API
info.description: Backend API for TrustLedger - Investment Platform for Renewable Energy Projects

request.description: Detailed health check with status information
Login as a user and receive JWT token
Register a new user account. Type can be 'individual' or 'business'
Login as admin and receive JWT token
Get list of issuances with optional filters
Get detailed information about a specific issuance
Get list of projects with optional filters
Get list of posts with optional category filter
Get detailed information about a specific post
Update user profile. All fields are optional.
Update wallet address and network. Network: ethereum, polygon, binance, arbitrum
Get all investments for the authenticated user
Create a new investment. Payment method: bank_transfer, credit_card, sepa
Get transactions with optional type and status filters
Get all assets for the authenticated user
Get all notifications for the authenticated user
Mark a specific notification as read
Get paginated list of users with filters
Update user KYC status. Status: pending, approved, rejected
Activate or deactivate a user account
Get paginated list of transactions with filters

body.raw:

  "title": "Solar Farm Project Germany",

request.description: Create a new issuance. Type: Wind, Solar. Status: open, closed, upcoming. RiskLevel: Low, Medium, High. PaymentFrequency: Monthly, Quarterly, Annually, At Maturity
Create a new project. Type: Wind, Solar. Status: In development, Live, Completed
